title: What are Batman main gadgets? - Quora

response.answer_text: Batarangs Despite being Batman's simplest gadget, the Batarang is his most effective.  Bat-Bombs Bombs are pretty dangerous, and adding bats to the front makes it even more deadly.  The Batmobile Probably Batman's greatest killing machine in terms of the sheer number of lethal weapons it comes loaded with, but good grief batman doesn't kill(forget batman vs superman).  Bat-Napalm While never explicitly referred to as napalm, it's hard to take this blue sticky substance that bursts into flames upon contact as anything other than Batman's own vicious version of the wartime weapon.  Bat Fist Out Of all the gadgets none of them is more lethal than Batman's own fist, imagine getting your teeth knocked by him or spine your getting crushed….
Communication device, grapple gun, bat-a-rangs, sample kit (forensic collecting), sprays (knock out, recovery, first aid, etc.), a filter mask (covers lower part of face and nose), and other items.
